SELECT p.board_no, p.homepage, p.thumbnail, p.recommended_count, p.readable, b.board_no, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.registered_date, m.member_no, -- 회원번호 -- m.id, -- id값 -- m.name, -- 이름 -- m.email, -- 이메일 -- g.seeking_flag, -- 재직여부 -- m.photo, -- 사진경로 -- g.membership -- 멤버십 -- FROM pf_portfolio as p LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_board as b ON p.board_no = b.board_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_general_member as g ON g.general_member_no = p.general_member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_members as m ON m.member_no = g.general_member_no WHERE p.readable = 1 ORDER BY b.registered_date desc, p.recommended_count desc
limit ${startIndex}, ${pageSize}

SELECT p.board_no, p.homepage, p.thumbnail, p.recommended_count, p.readable, b.board_no, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.registered_date, m.member_no, -- 회원번호 -- m.id, -- id값 -- m.name, -- 이름 -- m.email, -- 이메일 -- g.seeking_flag, -- 재직여부 -- m.photo, -- 사진경로 -- g.membership -- 멤버십 -- FROM pf_portfolio as p LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_board as b ON p.board_no = b.board_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_general_member as g ON g.general_member_no = p.general_member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_members as m ON m.member_no = g.general_member_no WHERE m.member_no = ${number}
SELECT count(*) from pf_portfolio WHERE readable = 1
SELECT count(*) from pf_portfolio p LEFT OUTER JOIN pf_general_member m ON p.general_member_no = m.general_member_no WHERE p.general_member_no = ${number}
